snippet: In an effort to track the long-term health effects of the nuclear disaster at Fukushima, Japan has begun a survey of local children for thyroid abnormalities.
lead_paragraph: In an effort to track the long-term health effects of the nuclear disaster at Fukushima, Japan has begun a survey of local children for thyroid abnormalities.

headline.main: In Japan, a Long-Term Study on Radiation Leaks’ Effects
headline.print_headline: In Japan, a Long-Term Study On Radiation Leaks’ Effects
headline.seo: Japanese Study Nuclear Leaks Health Effects
